title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 534.2 - Standards
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 534.2 - Standards

State Regulations
A customer overpayment is defined as payment by the
customer to the utility in excess of the correct charge for water service
supplied to the customer which was caused by erroneous billing by the
utility. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
534.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
